lttCalculator.text: Use this calculator to help you work out how much Land Transaction Tax (LTT) you may need to pay if you buy property or land in Wales.

rateChecker.text: Check if you need to pay a higher rate of Land Transaction Tax.

mdrCalculator.text: Use this calculator to help you work out how much Land Transaction Tax (LTT) relief applies when you buy multiple dwellings in Wales.
